availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James G. Walden (Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Walden and Eliza Walden. Married Nannie J. Bailey Walden in Jefferson County, Kentucky on October 31, 1861. Farmer in Jefferson County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Jefferson County, Kentucky in 1860. Clerk in Jefferson County, Kentucky in 1862. Enrolled for military duty in Second District of Kentucky on July 1, 1863 (U.S.A).

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 1044.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 264.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Jefferson County, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #00819614, p.76.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Jefferson County, KY, July 1863, p. 264, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
